TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GridViewRowEventHandler(object sender, GridViewRowEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GridViewRowEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub GridViewRowEventHandler(sender As Object, e As GridViewRowEventArgs)
public delegate void GridViewRowEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, GridViewRowEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Un objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controla los eventos y de un control .

span.span: Represents the method that handles the and events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Antes de la se puede representar el control, un objeto debe crearse para cada fila en el control.Before the control can be rendered, a object must be created for each row in the control. El evento se desencadena cada vez que una fila en la se crea el control.The event is raised each time a row in the control is created. Esto le permite proporcionar un método de control de eventos que realiza una rutina personalizada, como agregar contenido personalizado a una fila, siempre que se produce este evento.This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs. De igual forma, cada fila en el control debe estar enlazado a un registro en el origen de datos antes de la se puede representar el control.Similarly, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source before the control can be rendered. El evento se desencadena cuando una fila de datos (representado por un objeto) está enlazado a datos en el control.The event is raised when a data row (represented by a object) is bound to data in the control. Esto le permite proporcionar un método de control de eventos que realiza una rutina personalizada, como modificar los valores de los datos enlazados a la fila, siempre que se produce este evento.This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs. Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante programación un delegar a la eventos de un control.The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEventHandler/CS/gridviewroweventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEventHandler/VB/gridviewroweventhandlervb.aspx#1)] En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante declaración un delegar a la eventos de un control.The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataBound/CS/gridviewrowdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataBound/VB/gridviewrowdataboundvb.aspx#1)]
